physics.instructorProfile: Dr. Oyeleke is a PhD holder in the Department of Physics at LASUSTECH. With a PhD in Physical Science and over two decades of experience in both teaching and research, Dr. Oyeleke is an expert in celestial mechanics and planetary science as well as other areas in physics.
